titleInfo.title: Children in the Nursery at the National Home for Jewish Children in Denver

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#388 Residents of Nat. Home for Jewish Children'' and ''Jewish Sheltering Home 1910-1950s''. On back of photograph: ''#388 Nursery at National Home for Jewish Children date unknown Photographed by Burt. N. Pinter''.

mods.abstract: A group of children in the Nursery at the National Home for Jewish Children at Denver, which later became part of the National Jewish Hospital.
mods.note: Donated by the National Asthma Center.

name.namePart: Children's Asthma Research Institute and Hospital (Denver, Colo.)
National Jewish Hospital and Research Center/National Asthma Center (U.S.)
Jewish National Home for Asthmatic Children in Denver
National Home for Jewish Children in Denver
Denver Sheltering Home for Jewish Children
